title: How do I enable or disable the data service?
answer:
Go to Settings. Touch Mobile networks > Data connection. Select your service provider to turn on the data service, or Off to turn off the data service. 

 Drag the status bar downward: 

 In the toolbox of the notification panel, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112865) to turn on the data service. The icon changes to ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112866) when the data service is turned on. 

 Go to Settings. Touch Dual card > Data connection. Select your service provider to turn on the data service, or Off to turn off the data service.
